comment.body:
I am from the USA and our news media here keeps saying that Russia is like the old Soviet Union. I know that this is not true. I have been following a youtuber called Real Russia.
https://www.youtube.com/user/realrussiablog
I think his reporting is accurate. 
The Russian people are awesome. I grew up in the cold war and it was horrible. The national news media here wants to put america into another cold war with Russia. It just wont work. We have the internet now and there lies just expose them for who they are.
